title: I Loved this Hotel!!!!
text: I have to say that for a Boutique style hotel this property was awesome!!! It was centrally located, great staff, very friendly and excellent service.It's right off Michigan Avenue so i don't think you can get better than this, it is a beautiful property and we got a great rate. The rooms were big, bathroom was real nice looking and spotless clean and the bed was super comfortable.I enjoyed everyday of my stay and would definitely go back and recommend this hotel to anyone that is visiting Chicago!!!
